project.name: div2js
project.description: A DIV2 Game Studio compiler to JavaScript

runtime.name: runtime
runtime.description:
Core component of `div2js`. Allow to create several runtimes for compiled
DIV2 programs and run them.

EndOfExecution.name: EndOfExecution
EndOfExecution.description:
A exception thrown when a
{{#crossLink "DIV2ProcessManager"}}{{/crossLink}} instance has no more
processes to run.

DIV2ProcessManager.name: DIV2ProcessManager
DIV2ProcessManager.description:
Control the execution of a DIV2 program managing its process hierarchy.
The process manager receive a set of process definitions and an entry
point to start running the DIV2 program.

params.name: processDefinitons
params.description:
set of process definitions generated by
the DIV2js compiler.

DIV2Runtime.name: DIV2Runtime
DIV2Runtime.description: The runtime in which a DIV2 compiled program runs.

classitems.description:
Provide an object with functions bound to the current manager to be
used by processes. Methods are related to process management. Currently,
the following functions are provided:

  * `_new_process_` to instantiate new processes by name.
classitems.name: getProcessLibrary

return.description: a library with process management related functions.

classitems.description:
Create a new process in the form of a
{{#crossLink "DIV2Process"}}{{/crossLink}} instance.
classitems.name: newProcess

params.name: processName
params.description: the name of the process to be created.

params.name: arguments
params.description: arguments to be passed to the process constructor.

return.description: The process ID for the new process.

classitems.description:
Advance the state of the processes to the next frame and perform process'
life-cycle management.
classitems.name: run

params.name: libraries
params.description: a hash of libraries to be used by processes.

classitems.description:
Advance the state of a process to the next frame.

Executing a process could end in different results: currently, the process
could reach a frame sentence without a percentage of completion. In this
case, it is considered the process has completed a whole frame and the
process' execution ends now.

In the other hand, a process could reach the end of its body ending its
execution forever.
classitems.name: _runProcess

params.name: libraries
params.description:
set of libraries to be used by the process
during its execution.

classitems.description: Remove dying or death processes from the process list.
classitems.name: _updateProcessList

classitems.description:
Return the next process id available. Two alive processes will have never
the same id but ids of dead processes can be reused.
classitems.name: _getPID

return.description:
an odd integer which represents the process unique
identifier number.

classitems.description:
Load function libraries for this runtime. Only process management and
runtime libraries are loaded at the current moment.

Set the frequency at which process should run and render should redraw
the scene.
classitems.name: _setFPS

params.name: fps
params.description:
refresh ratio in frames per second. The minimum value
is 4 and the maximum is 200.

params.name: slip
params.description:
number of frames to be skipped if fps ration can not
be maintained. It accepts 3 values: 0 means there is no skipping so the
program could not run at max speed under stress conditions; 1 means the
runtime will try to maintain the fps ratio omitting some frames from time
to time automatically; a value greater than 1 means the runtime will
skip at most that value when it can not hold the framerate.

classitems.description: Schedule the next frame after some milliseconds.
classitems.name: _rescheduleNextFrame

params.name: period
params.description:
number of milliseconds before the next frame is
executed. See {{#crossLink _setFPS:method}}{{/crossLink}} method.

classitems.description:
Advances the state of the program by running all the processes and
redrawing the scene.
classitems.name: _doFrame

classitems.description:
Return a {{#crossLink "DIV2Runtime"}}{{/crossLink}} instance with the
DIV2 compiled program loaded and ready to start running.
classitems.name: getRuntime

params.name: programDefinition
params.description:
the compiled program defition
for which the runtime is created.

return.description:
The runtime for the program defintion. You must call
{{#crossLink "DIV2Runtime/start:method"}}{{/crossLink}} to run the program.

warnings.message:
Missing item type
Load function libraries for this runtime. Only process management and
runtime libraries are loaded at the current moment.
